ast.name: puzzleCam
ast.comment:
Simlpe Camera-, Picture Puzzle.

Select:
MODE & MATRIX.
camera or libary / 3x4, 4x5, 5x6.
App cuts the Picture into tiny squares
and mixes their order.

Drag or Tab the pices, to get back
to Original.
Tab two pices to swap their Position.

V2.0 adds tabed sorting, solves the
hidden pice Problem.

decls.name: tap sprite in cam pic menu

body.text: Input x, y Output: x, y Matrix konform
